sentences.sentence: What’s that? <color=red>A gag</color>? You think it’s mine? You’ve got it all wrong.
*Sighs* Look, I don’t need to explain myself to you. But if you’re so determined to know...
You should talk to the old woman. She knows people—people who might know more about... certain things.
I won’t say more. I’ve got nothing to do with it.
You’ll find what you’re looking for with <color=red>her</color>. She’s not so innocent, you know.
I won’t say more. I’ve got nothing to do with it.
Now, if you’re done here, I suggest you go see <color=red>her</color>. You’ll get the answers you want.
